pkgmetadata.longdescription: Constructing Hierarchical Voronoi Tessellations and Overlay Heatmap for Data Analysis // The muHVT package is a collection of R functions to facilitate building topology preserving maps for rich multivariate data.See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voronoi_diagram for more information. Credits to Mu Sigma for their continuous support throughout the development of the package.
